.. _`design_system_components_relationshiptable`:

RelationshipTable
=================

.. figure:: images/component_relationshiptable.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Displays a set of related objects according to one relationship type along with information on the related objects in a table format.
Operations on the relationships and the target objects can be executed through the toolbar.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.objectwidgets.ConnectedRelationshipTable.ConnectedRelationshipTable`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_relationshiptreetable`
